entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Async io never completes in .net 6 #69377
  • tracing/eventpipe/eventsvalidation tests failing with AF: codeLength > 0 #69375
  • Azure DevOps is down - all CI jobs failing #69374
  • MemoryMappedFile slow program termination #69365

Closed

  • `dotnet.exe` doesn't uniquely identify duplicate resolved SDK paths #69371
  • Interop\StringMarshalling\UTF8\UTF8Test failing in outerloop #69349
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Support ref fields in `System.Reflection.Metadata.Ecma335.BlobEncoder`. #69378
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Remove CngKeyLite #69376
    area-System.Security
  • Move constants to the right when canonicalizing commutative operations in VN #69368
    community-contribution
  • Only fold Type.op_Equality calls before morphing args #69367
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update signing of JS files #69366
  • Allow convert from pointer to pointer #69364
    area-System.Linq.Expressions, community-contribution
  • Add `IntPtr` conversion APIs for some runtime handles #69363
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Fix UTF8 string marshalling regression #69360
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Revert "Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() and friends" #69373
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix typo in 'parameter' #69370
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Implement constant-folding for `VNF_BitCast` #68979
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Run host tests with dotnet test and enable crash/hang dumps #69340
    area-Host
  • Fix ProcessorCount calculation on Windows 11 #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix for GetMemberWithSameMetadataDefinitionAs #69284
    area-System.Reflection
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Prevent debugger deadlock with code versioning logic #68367
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Restore FP pairs when unwinding in ARM64 #69359
    Servicing-consider
  • Use intrinsic for genLog2() #69333
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add more char.Is* helpers for common ASCII sets #69318
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix ASAN violation under Samsung's netcoredbg #69339
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink loop with stackalloc #69335
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • hostpolicy: As a fallback, try to resolve mangled stdcall symbols on win-x86. #67813
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Redhawk to NativeAOT #69227
    community-contribution
  • Adding Int128 and UInt128 with a base software implementation #69204
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Allow source generation for classes with ignored init-only props #69327
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add AppContext data support for DefaultMaxConnectionsPerServer #68952
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix debug proxy when used with blazor #69342
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
